SELECT a.id AS "id", a.`name` AS "name", a.serial_num AS "serialNum", a.self_num AS "selfNum", a.depict AS "depict", a.remark AS "remark" FROM im_product_info a where a.org_id=#{param.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and CONCAT(a.`name`,a.serial_num,a.self_num) like CONCAT('%',#{param.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.`name` AS "name", a.self_num AS "selfNum" FROM im_product_info a WHERE a.org_id =#{param.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM im_product_change_detail b WHERE a.id = b.product_id and b.bill_id=#{param.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT b.id AS "id", b.`name` AS "name", b.self_num AS "selfNum", a.qty AS "qty" FROM im_product_change_detail a, im_product_info b WHERE a.product_id = b.id AND a.bill_id =#{param.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO im_product_change_detail (id, bill_id, product_id,qty) SELECT UUID(), #{param.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a.id, 1 FROM im_product_info a WHERE CONCAT(',',#{param.productIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ',') LIKE CONCAT('%,', a.id, ',%') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM im_product_change_detail b WHERE a.id = b.product_id and b.bill_id=#{param.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and a.org_id=#{param.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

DELETE FROM im_product_change_detail WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM im_product_info a WHERE CONCAT( ',', #{param.productIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ',') LIKE CONCAT('%,', a.id, ',%') AND im_product_change_detail.product_id = a.id AND im_product_change_detail.bill_id =#{param.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
UPDATE im_product_info SET qty = IFNULL(qty,0) + ( SELECT qty FROM im_product_change_detail b WHERE b.bill_id = #{param.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b.product_id = im_product_info.id )
